text: Zedekiah son of Josiah succeeded Jeconiah son of Jehoiakim as king. He was elevated to the throne of the land of Judah by King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon.
Neither he nor the officials who served him nor the people of Judah paid any attention to what the Lord said through the prophet Jeremiah.
King Zedekiah sent Jehucal son of Shelemiah and the priest Zephaniah son of Maaseiah to the prophet Jeremiah to say, “Please pray to the Lord our God on our behalf.”

(Now <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> had <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> yet been <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> in <st data-num="01004 03628">prison</st>.<n id="1" /> So he was still free to <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="03318" class="">go</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> as he pleased.<n id="2" />

At that time the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonian</st> forces<n id="1" /> had temporarily given up their siege <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="2" /> They had <st data-num="06696" class="">had</st> it <st data-num="06696" class="">under siege</st>, but <st data-num="05927 05921 03389">withdrew</st> when they <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="08088" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> of <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> had <st data-num="03318" class="">set out</st> from <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.<n id="3" />)
The Lord’s message came to the prophet Jeremiah,

“This is what the Lord God of Israel has said, ‘This is what you must say to the king of Judah who sent you to seek my help. “Beware, Pharaoh’s army that was on its way to help you is about to go back home to Egypt.

Then the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonian</st> forces<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>. They will <st data-num="03898 05921">attack</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">the</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and will <st data-num="03920" class="">capture</st> it and <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> it <st data-num="0784" class="">down</st>.
Moreover, I, the Lord, warn you not to deceive yourselves into thinking that the Babylonian forces will go away and leave you alone. For they will not go away.
For even if you were to defeat all the Babylonian forces fighting against you so badly that only wounded men were left lying in their tents, they would get up and burn this city down.”’”
The following events also occurred while the Babylonian forces had temporarily withdrawn from Jerusalem because the army of Pharaoh was coming.

<st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> started to <st data-num="03318" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>. He wanted to make sure he <st data-num="02505" class="">got</st> his <st data-num="02505" class="">share of the property that was being divided up</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> his <st data-num="05971" class="">family</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.<n id="1" />

But <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> only <st data-num="01961" class="">got</st> as far as the <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">Gate</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">There</st> an <st data-num="01167" class="">officer</st> in charge of the <st data-num="06488" class="">guards</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">named</st> <st data-num="03376" class="">Irijah</st>,<n id="2" /> who was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08018" class="">Shelemiah</st> and the <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, stopped him. He <st data-num="08610" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="03414 05030">Jeremiah</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="05307" class="">deserting</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>!”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">answered</st>, “That’s a <st data-num="08267" class="">lie</st>! I <st data-num="0369" class="">am not</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">deserting</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.”<n id="1" /> But Irijah would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him. <st data-num="03376" class="">Irijah</st> <st data-num="08610" class="">put</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="08610" class="">under arrest</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">took</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st>.
The officials were very angry with Jeremiah. They had him flogged and put in prison in the house of Jonathan, the royal secretary, which they had converted into a place for confining prisoners.
So Jeremiah was put in prison in a cell in the dungeon in Jonathan’s house. He was kept there for a long time.

Then King Zedekiah had him brought to the palace. There he questioned him privately and asked him, “Is there any message from the Lord?” Jeremiah answered, “Yes, there is.” Then he announced, “You will be handed over to the king of Babylon.”

Then <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">crime</st> have I <st data-num="02398" class="">committed</st> against you, or the <st data-num="05650" class="">officials who serve</st> you, or the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="02088" class="">Judah</st>? What have I done <st data-num="03588" class="">to make</st> you people <st data-num="05414" class="">throw</st> me <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> <st data-num="01004 03608">prison</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="0346" class="">Where</st> now are the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05012" class="">prophesied</st> to you <st data-num="0559" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935 05921">attack</st> you or <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>?

But <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> <st data-num="04994" class="">please</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st>, your <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="0113" class="">Majesty</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05307 04994 06440">grant</st> my <st data-num="08467" class="">plea for mercy</st>.<n id="2" /> Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">send</st> me <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03083" class="">Jonathan</st>, the royal <st data-num="05608" class="">secretary</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="03808" class="">do</st>, I will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.”<n id="3" />

Then King Zedekiah ordered that Jeremiah be committed to the courtyard of the guardhouse. He also ordered that a loaf of bread be given to him every day from the bakers’ street until all the bread in the city was gone. So Jeremiah was kept in the courtyard of the guardhouse.
